pages.text: Only affects spells involved with movement and exploration. Affected spells cooldown is decreased 65% and range of effect is increased 15%. Casting an affected spell has a 12.5% chance of granting the caster Speed. Affects:$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_the_sojourn)Path of the Sojourn$()

pages.mod_text: Your scepter seeks to travel the world. Imbued onto the Travelers Scepter and persists through the Path of the Sojourn
